MANIPULATION DE DONNEES

LET, DIM
CONTROLE DU DEROULEMENT DE PROGRAMME

IF, FOR, WHILE, DO WHILE, GOSUB, DEF FN, ON GOTO
ENTREES / SORTIES

LIST, PRINT, INPUT, TAB, SPC, PLAY
FONCTIONS ARITHMETIQUES

<, >, =, ≤, ≥, <>
+, -, *, /, %, ^
AND, OR, NOT
FONCTIONS MATHEMATIQUES

ABS, ATN, COS, EXP, INT, LN, LOG, RND, SIN, SQR, TAN, MIN, MAX, PGCD
FONCTIONS GRAPHIQUES

DRAWSQUARE, DRAWCIRCLE, DRAWTRIANGLE, DRAWRECTANGLE, DRAWLINE, DRAWCLEAR, DRAWCLEARAREA
FONCTIONS AUDIO

PLAY
AUTRES

LABEL
